column2: SELECT Tab.Id, SalesOrderJsonData.Customer, SalesOrderJsonData.Date   FROM   SalesOrderRecord AS Tab             CROSS APPLY        OPENJSON (Tab.json, N&&&)              WITH (                 Number   varchar(#) N&&&,                  Date     datetime     N&&&,                 Customer varchar(#) N&&&,                  Quantity int          N&&&              )     AS SalesOrderJsonData   WHERE JSON_VALUE(Tab.json, &&&) = N&&&   ORDER BY JSON_VALUE(Tab.json, &&&), Tab.DateModified
